name: unrefrigerated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not kept cold in a fridge: Store, unrefrigerated, in a cool, dark place for up to 3 weeks. Energy bars will keep all day unrefrigerated without any problem.
(of a room or container) not kept at a very low temperature: Some foodstuffs are transported in unrefrigerated containers. The sample deteriorated after it was stored in an unrefrigerated evidence room. Related word
refrigerate
More examplesFewer examplesLemons left unrefrigerated for long periods of time are susceptible to mould. Unrefrigerated, the flowers would last no more than a day or two, at best.
